text: School Engelbert-von-Berg-Gymnasium Wipperfürth (EvB) is a gymnasium (secondary school) in Wipperfürth, Germany. The school in its modern form began in 1830. \- From the title "175 JahreEngelbert-von-Berg-Gymnasium" meaning 175th anniversary. 1830 plus 175 would be 2005. ==Notable alumni== * Afu Thomas - Social media figure in China \- German version ==References== ==Further reading== * ==External links== * Engelbert-von-Berg-Gymnasium Wipperfürth Category:Gymnasiums in Germany Category:Oberbergischer Kreis Category:1830 establishments in Germany Category:Educational institutions established in 1830
title: Engelbert-von-Berg-Gymnasium Wipperfürth
